lines.gurmukhi: joeI pRBu BwvY qwih sovq jgwvY jwie; jwgq ibhwvY jwie qwih n bulwveI [

Unknown.translation: A woman-like seeker whom He likes, Lord goes and wakes her up. But one who spends the night awake, He does not go and talk to her.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijhVI jigAwsU rUp iesqRI pRBU nUM Bw jwvy, aus nUM su`qI nUM jw jgwauˆdw hY, pr keI vyr ijs dI jwgidAwˆ rwq bIqdI hY aus nUM pRBU bulwauˆdw hI nhIˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: joeI pRBu BwvY qwih mwnin mnwvY Dwie; syvk sÍrUp syvw krq n BwveI [

Unknown.translation: The seeker woman who is liked by Him, and even if she is proud and arrogant, He rushes to please her and bring her around. On the other hand, a seeker woman may be seen doing service outwardly, she may not be liked by Him even then.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijhVI pRBU nUM Bw jwvy auh Bwvyˆ mwx m`q BI hovy, pRBU Dw ky aus nUM mnwauˆdw hY, pr kdy jo syvk sÍrUp ho syvw krdI hY pqI nUM BwauˆdI nhIˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: joeI pRBu BwvY qwih rIJ kY irJwvY Awpw; kwiC kwiC AwvY qwih pg n lgwveI [

Unknown.translation: The seeker woman whom Lord likes and becomes kind upon her, He pleases her but one who adorns herself and come to Him with ego-filled mind, He does not even let her touch His feet.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijhVI pRBU nUM BwauˆdI hY, aus nUM Awp qru`T ky pRsMn krdw hY, pr kdy jo Awpw sjw Pbw ky AwauˆdI hY aus nUM pYr BI nhIˆ Cuhwauˆdw[

lines.gurmukhi: joeI pRBu BwvY qwih sbY bn AwvY qw kI; mihmw Apwr n khq bn AwveI [594[

Unknown.translation: A seeker woman whom He likes, all efforts and labour bear fruit. Her grandeur is beyond and difficult to express.  (594)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijhVI pRBU nUM BwauˆdI hY, aus nUM swrIAwˆ g`lwˆ bx AwauˆdIAwˆ hn, aus dI mihmw pwr qoˆ rihq hY qy khI nhIˆ bx AwauˆdI ]594]
